name: bj-n0i

body.origin:

-| wne(c0, emptycls)
-| wb(wne(c0, emptycls), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| wne(c0, emptycls)
-| wb(wne(c0, emptycls), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, emptycls), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

comment: Inference associated with ~ n0 . Shortens ~ 2ndcdisj (2888>2878), ~ notzfaus (264>253). (Contributed by BJ, 22-Apr-2019.)
